About the Company: Talwalkars Better Value Fitness Ltd is one of the largest fitness chains in India offering a diverse suite of services including gyms, spas, aerobics and health counseling under the brand Talwalkars. Talwalkars has pioneered the concept of gyms in India and today they are a recognized name in the health and fitness industry.The products and service offered by the company includes Fitness Training:Personal exercise program.Body sculpting.Body shaping.Nutrition Centre:Weight loss program.Weight maintenance program.Weight gain program. Value Add-ons:Spa /Massage.Aerobics.Spinning.Steam/Sauna bath.
